sections.code: *,.s_ipt{font-family:"Source Han Sans SC","Source Han Sans","HanHei SC",-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,system-ui,sans-serif}
.adsbygoogle{display:none !important}
.s-treasure,.mnav[href^="http"]:not([href*="baidu.com"]),.qrcode-layer{display:none !important}
.nav-new,.bizr_rb,[id^="rightgameout"]{display:none !important}
#mohe-know_side_nlp-imagelist,#mohe-hot_hqr{display:none !important}
.ad{display:none !important}
